prt_are02,146,141,6	script	Equip Shop	953,{
switch(select("Headgear Top:Headgear Middle:Headgear Low:Armor:Shield:Shoes:Garment:Accessory")) {
	case 1:
		callshop "Headgear Top",1;
		break;
	case 2:
		callshop "Headgear Middle",1;
		break;
	case 3:
		callshop "Headgear Lower",1;
		break;
	case 4:
		callshop "Armor",1;
		break;
	case 5:
		callshop "Shield",1;
		break;
	case 6:
		callshop "Shoe",1;
		break;
	case 7:
		callshop "Garment",1;
		break;
	case 8:
		callshop "Accessory",1;
		break;
	}
}

-	shop	Headgear Top	441,5409:-1,5430:-1,5396:-1,5491:-1,5518:-1,5137:-1,5374:-1,5428:-1,5170:-1,2285:-1,5225:-1,5293:-1,5123:-1,5171:-1,5808:-1,5277:-1,5278:-1,5423:-1,5357:-1,5125:-1,5165:-1,5164:-1,5124:-1,2289:-1,5172:-1,5126:-1,5128:-1,5132:-1,5344:-1,5340:-1,5341:-1,5127:-1,5342:-1,5343:-1,5345:-1,5177:-1,5058:-1;
-	shop	Headgear Middle	442,5389:-1,5074:-1,5068:-1,2202:-1,5325:-1,2291:-1,2212:-1,5288:-1,2204:-1,5014:-1,5086:-1,2281:-1,5800:-1,2296:-1;
-	shop	Headgear Lower	443,5377:-1,5113:-1,5096:-1,5597:-1,5305:-1,5419:-1,5362:-1,5594:-1,5596:-1,5574:-1,5445:-1,5110:-1,5536:-1,2267:-1,2262:-1,5107:-1,5220:-1,2218:-1,2265:-1,5361:-1,2241:-1,2266:-1,5004:-1,2268:-1,2269:-1,2270:-1,5811:-1,5206:-1,2266:-1,5462:-1,5463:-1;
-	shop	Armor	440,2375:-1,2357:-1,2374:-1,2399:-1,2378:-1,2376:-1,2381:-1,2377:-1,2382:-1,2388:-1,2319:-1,2354:-1,2373:-1,2342:-1,2391:-1,2318:-1,2345:-1,2372:-1,2317:-1,2355:-1,2380:-1,2364:-1,2359:-1,2340:-1,2353:-1,2360:-1,2365:-1,2326:-1,2322:-1,2367:-1,2387:-1,2379:-1,2371:-1;
-	shop	Shield	439,2131:-1,2138:-1,2115:-1,2123:-1,2124:-1,2125:-1,2116:-1,2120:-1,2121:-1,2106:-1,2130:-1,2108:-1,2128:-1,2122:-1,2114:-1,2104:-1,2102:-1,2133:-1,2113:-1,2134:-1,2129:-1;
